thread.title: WATCH: Gary Neville Appears On ArsenalFanTV
thread.title_full: WATCH: Gary Neville Appears On ArsenalFanTV

title: WATCH: Gary Neville Appears On ArsenalFanTV
text:
WATCH: Gary Neville Appears On ArsenalFanTV Fri Feb 17 2017 22:22:35   22:22:35 GMT+0000 (GMT) Joe Baiamonte Joe Baiamonte in football 
In an appearance two weeks in the making, Gary Neville sat down with the Premier League's most combustible, bloodclart heavy online fan channel, ArsenalFanTV. 
Neville's appearance on a special edition of the show, which primarily takes place in the wake of the Gunners' home and away games, has been built for the past fortnight after he referred to one Arsenal fan as 'an idiot' for holding up an anti-Arsene Wenger banner during a 3-1 Premier League defeat to Chelsea. Credit: Sky Sports 
ArsenalFanTV host Robbie took exception to Neville's branding of the fan, as did several of the most high profile regulars to appear on the channel, who were in no better a mood following Wednesday's 5-1 Champions League mauling by Bayern Munich, as the post match interviews proved. 
Once Neville agreed to sit down with Robbie, DT, Troopz, Claude and Moh, English football fans couldn't wait to see what unfolded and, earlier today, the Manchester United legend and Sky Sports pundit was grilled by the Gunners' panel for his attitude towards their club and his recent comments as well as whether Wayne Rooney did indeed dive during the 2004/05 'Pizza Gate' Premier League clash that saw Arsenal's 49 match unbeaten league run come to a controversial end after a 2-0 defeat at Old Trafford. 
While the interview is perhaps not as explosive as many thought it would be, it is still well worth a watch as the Premier League and Champions League winning full back is grilled by Claude and co and, somehow, everyone manages to maintain a reasonable level of composure. 
We just wish there'd been more prolific use of the word 'bloodclart'.
